statements: UPDATE cost_savings_analysis SET fuel_consumption = 8.50, vehicle_type = 'SUV' WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
UPDATE cost_savings_analysis SET electricity_cost = 1000.00, gasoline_cost = 1500.00, city_mileage = 25.00 WHERE vehicle_id = 2;
UPDATE cost_savings_analysis SET fuel_type = 'Electric' WHERE vehicle_id = 101;
UPDATE cost_savings_analysis SET fuel_consumption = 25.50, miles_per_gallon = 30.75, electricity_cost = 120.80 WHERE vehicle_model = 'Tesla Model S';
UPDATE electric_vehicles SET electric_range_miles = 250 WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
UPDATE fuel_powered_vehicles SET fuel_cost_per_gallon = 2.75, gas_mileage_mpg = 30, model_year = 2021 WHERE vehicle_id = 2;
UPDATE electric_vehicles SET electric_range_miles = 300.50, cost_per_mile = 0.12 WHERE vehicle_id = 101;
UPDATE fuel_powered_vehicles SET fuel_cost_per_gallon = 3.25, gas_mileage_mpg = 30 WHERE vehicle_id = 201;
UPDATE vehicles SET cost_per_mile = 0.05, emissions_per_mile = 0.02 WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
UPDATE trips SET trip_cost = 50.75, trip_emissions = 3.25 WHERE trip_id = 10;
UPDATE vehicles SET cost_per_mile = 0.08, emissions_per_mile = 8.45 WHERE vehicle_type = 'SUV';
UPDATE trips SET trip_cost = 56.75, trip_emissions = 7.32 WHERE distance_traveled > 100 AND vehicle_id = 2;
UPDATE electric_vehicles SET manufacturer='Tesla', year=2022 WHERE vehicle_id=1;
UPDATE fuel_powered_vehicles SET fuel_type='Diesel', year=2019 WHERE vehicle_id=3;
UPDATE electric_vehicles SET year = 2022, battery_capacity = 60.25 WHERE vehicle_id = 101;
UPDATE fuel_powered_vehicles SET fuel_type = 'Diesel', year = 2019 WHERE vehicle_id = 201;
UPDATE cost_savings SET cost_saved = 2000 WHERE id = 1
UPDATE vehicle_details SET year = 2015, vehicle_make = 'Toyota' WHERE vehicle_id = 3
UPDATE cost_savings SET cost_saved = 500.25 WHERE vehicle_type = 'SUV' AND fuel_type = 'Diesel';
UPDATE vehicle_details SET vehicle_make = 'Toyota', vehicle_model = 'Camry' WHERE vehicle_id = 3;
